      • parse

        public List<String> parse(String[] args)
                   throws NullPointerException,
                          NoSuchOptionException,
                          ArgumentParsingException
        Parses command line arguments and sets the values to the subject.
        Parameters:
        args - The command line arguments.
        Returns:
        A list of the remaining parameters (i.e. arguments that are not options of values of options).
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If args is null.
        NoSuchOptionException - If an option is encountered that is not configured.
        ArgumentParsingException - If something goes wrong with the parsing or setting of parameters.

      • setUsageHeader

        public void setUsageHeader(String usageHeader)
        Sets the text to be shown at the beginning of the usage text.
        Parameters:
        usageHeader - The header text.
        See Also:
        printUsage(java.io.PrintStream)

      • printUsage

        public void printUsage(PrintStream output)
                throws NullPointerException
        Prints the usage text, based on the description and default annotation elements and the usage header.
        Parameters:
        output - The target for printing.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If output is null.
        See Also:
        setUsageHeader(java.lang.String), printUsage()

      • printUsage

        public void printUsage()
        Like #printUsage(Stream output), but prints to System.out.
